name: Slurp!
description:
If you and your friends are looking for a 2-player game, this is the one!

This 2D pixelated game for two players is set in a pond environment. One player who controls the real fly needs to hide himself among all the AI flies and to dodge the frog's attack every 15 seconds, otherwise frog will get 1 point. The other player who controls the flog needs to find the right timing to protrude his tongue to eat the real fly every 15 seconds, or the fly will get 1 point. 

Anyone who first reaches 5 points wins the game!! And you can play again and again after the countdown!! 

Control:

Use W,A,S,D to control the fly (need to find yourself among the AI flies when game starts!)

Use MOUSE to control the frog's pupils which is also the direction of the tongue; LEFT CLICK to protrude the tongue and eat the fly(If the AI fly is eaten, tongue's speed will slow down!Be careful when choosing the fly!

A big thank you to all my FIRE team members, Jack Veselovski, Samantha Ding, Issac Jiang and Red Liang, who helped me to develop this game during those weeks!!
